name: Leogulus.GitHub.io
body:
## Welcome to Taweewat's Website
I am a graduate student in the Physics Department and Kavli Institute at Massachusetts Institute of Technology. This is my professional website about the my research and my interests. 

I study galaxy clusters and my current project is identifying Phoenix-like clusters through All-Sky Survey Data, including ROSAT (X-ray), 2MASS (Near IR), WISE, Mid IR), NVSS/SUMSS (Radio).

Contact: 
Email: taweewat at mit.edu  
Github: github.com/leogulus

## Current Research:
I am interested in identifying nearby galaxy clusters with QSO dominant at the center which have been mislabeled simply as a QSO due to QSO's brightness. One example of this misidentified galaxy cluster is the "Phoenix Cluster" which discovered recently using the Sunyaevâ€“Zel'dovich effect with the South Pole Telescope. This lead us to question of how many of these nearby galaxy cluster we have been mislabeled in existing all-sky surveys. 

## Other side projects: 
 * Diagram showing no correlation between Physics GRE scores and GPA or General GRE quantitative section is [here](http://leogulus.github.io/fig.html)

### The rest is under construction.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
